column1: And there she is! all eyes are turned to where she lies
column2: dimly discernible through the gathering fog of the early winter afternoon; every finger is pointed in the same direction; and murmurs of interest and admiration드s 넫ow beautiful she looks!' 넫ow trim she is!'드re heard on every side. Even the lazy gentleman with his hat on one side and his hands in his pockets
column3: who has dispensed so much consolation by inquiring with a yawn of another gentleman whether he is 녆oing across'드s if it were a ferry든ven he condescends to look that way
column6: 넱o mistake about that:' and not even the sage Lord Burleigh in his nod
column7: included half so much as this lazy gentleman of might who has made the passage (as everybody on board has found out already; it's impossible to say how) thirteen times without a single accident! There is another passenger very much wrapped-up
column8: who has been frowned down by the rest
column9: and morally trampled upon and crushed
column10: for presuming to inquire with a timid interest how long it is since the poor President went down.
